content: I'm using clinFHIR's Scenario Builder to create a scenario using BiologicallyDerivedProduct (introduced in R4, http://hl7.org/fhir/biologicallyderivedproduct.html), but BiologicallyDerivedProduct is not listed as an available resource when I try to add it to the scenario. I tried using the Public HAPI R4 and Grahame's public R4 server. Any guidance is welcome.
My bad - I'll add it and ping you when done...
